title: Smash a Guitar
text: Smashing a guitar of someone singing a love song

title: Bond with Misfits
text: Bond with a group of lovable misfists

title: Make out with Hottest Girl
text: Make out with the hottest girl on campus

title: Get Pantsed
text: Getting pantsed by someone (while wearing the standard giant hearts on underwear)

title: Pledge the Fraternity
text: Pledge the cool fraternity (but unbeknownst to you, be the target of ridicule, without a chance in hell of ever getting in)

title: Create Robot
text: Create a quirky robot that, once bong water is spilled on its circuitry, will bring it to life, making you the coolest person in school

title: Ridiculous Situation
text: Ridiculous situation descending into heavy-handed drama for the illusion of story
